tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: We haven't discussed position size so far, as the intention of the testing of the trading idea is measuring hit ratio only.

paragraphs.text:
For the same reason, we are not going to get into further considerations at this point. We'll save a few thoughts in that regard for when we define the execution algorithm and orders.

I just brought you to the definition of the Trading Parameters of the trading session so that you may check how the initialBalance is defined!
